title: WTB/WTT Looking for a T210 Series 2 Levy
author: markf31

posts.post_title: WTB/WTT Looking for a T210 Series 2 Levy
posts.post_content:
I am looking for a T210 Series 2 Levy, open to just about any condition. I am open to a purchase or a trade for other T210s as well since I have a handful of doubles to trade.

Let me know.
